SPI_SlaveModeParams_t Struct Reference
SPI Driver External Data Structures

SPI slave mode Parameters. More...

#include <drivers/spi/SPI.h>

Data Fields

SPI_DMAChanCfg dmaCfg
 
uint8_t chipSelect
 

Detailed Description

SPI slave mode Parameters.

SPI slave Parameters are used with the SPI_open() call when mode is set to SPI_SLAVE. Default values for these parameters are set using SPI_Params_init().

See also
SPI_Params_init()

Field Documentation

uint8_t SPI_SlaveModeParams_t::chipSelect

CS0-CS7 signal number from 0 -7

SPI_DMAChanCfg SPI_SlaveModeParams_t::dmaCfg

System DMA channel configuration, used when DMA is enabled
